In my fifties I'm having a struggle with "what to wear." Ugh. I remember when 50 sounded so old to me and now here I am. I consider myself a young 50 though because I'm very active and don't "feel" my age at all. Except, I struggle with what is appropriate to wear now? I feel like I shouldn't dress too young, but I don't want to look like a frump either. Sadly, this top made me feel like a frumpy old woman. It wasn't flattering. It hung like a square box on me, and I felt like the top part went up to high on my chest. Not my style for sure. The color was nice and the sleeves were feminine, but I couldn't wait to take it off and return it. I'm 5'5 and about 160. I have a muscular build and a 36c bust.  It's not that it was too small or too big, it was just weird on me. Back to the search for cute, trendy, comfortable tops!
